title.rendered: Beef-Style Fig, Walnut and Pomegranate Salad

content.rendered:
Beef-Style Fig, Walnut and Pomegranate Salad

Ingredients

1 Box Fry’s Thick Cut Chunky Strips
Bowl of mixed lettuce
3 Medium figs, cut into quarters
1 Large pomegranate, deseeded
1 Cup walnuts
1/2 Cup pumpkin seeds
1/4 Cup sesame seeds
Fresh rocket
Balsamic vinegar, to serve

Directions

Fry the Strips for around 8 minutes in a little oil in a pan.

To make up the salad, place the Chunky Strips, figs, pomegranate seeds, nuts and seeds on top and around the fresh leaves. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar!
